channel.title: Equip Stats
channel.description:
When i try to click the "equipment stats" button in your character equipment area, it disconnects me from the server and gives me this error. [code] Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method60(client.java:3456) at client.method145(client.java:13877) at client.method62(client.java:3550) at client.method7(client.java:2652) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120) at client.run(client.java:93) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code] I have tried to fix this error, it keeps mentioning method62 and method7, do not really understand what to do.
after searching more into this i think it has something to do with interface 15106

item.title: Equip Stats
item.dc:creator: @ShakiShingi ShakiShingi
item.description:
@ShakiShingi wrote:

When i try to click the “equipment stats” button in your character equipment area, it disconnects me from the server and gives me this error.

Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at client.method60(client.java:3456)
        at client.method145(client.java:13877)
        at client.method62(client.java:3550)
        at client.method7(client.java:2652)
        at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:120)
        at client.run(client.java:93)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I have tried to fix this error, it keeps mentioning method62 and method7, do not really understand what to do.

after searching more into this i think it has something to do with interface 15106

Read full topic
